package.name: sqlitebrowser
package.install:
cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}/
mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/applications mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/appdata mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/icons/hicolor/256x256/apps install -m 0755 distri/sqlitebrowser.desktop ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/applications/sqlitebrowser.desktop sed -i 's/Development/CB-Other/g' ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/applications/sqlitebrowser.desktop sed -i 's%Icon=sqlitebrowser%Icon=/usr/share/icons/Faenza/mimetypes/scalable/application-x-sqlite3.svg%g' ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/applications/sqlitebrowser.desktop install -m 0644 src/icons/sqlitebrowser.png ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/icons/hicolor/256x256/apps/sqlitebrowser.png install -m 0644 distri/sqlitebrowser.desktop.appdata.xml ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/appdata/sqlitebrowser.desktop.appdata.xml install -m 0755 src/sqlitebrowser ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/sqlitebrowser
